title: Dictionary App
description: A feature-rich Dictionary app built using React. Users can search for almost any word, bookmark their favorites, and listen to pronunciations. (It's not yet optimized for mobile use.)

title: N-Puzzle Game
description: A modernized version of the classic 15-puzzle game, built using React. While the CSS isn't fully optimized, this project highlights my problem-solving and coding skills. The goal is to arrange the tiles in numerical order with an empty space at the bottom-right corner.

title: Recipe Finder
description: A user-friendly recipe search app built with React. It allows users to input ingredients and discover relevant recipes using the Spoonacular API. The app features responsive design, interactive modals, and demonstrates my skills in API integration and dynamic UI development.
